create_new_folder Creating /1 folder...

action.name: Execute Javascript
action.param: "sudo.exec('chmod 755 /1/Floflis/floflis-installer && cd /1/Floflis && ./floflis-installer', options, function(error, stdout, stderr){if (error) throw error;console.log('stdout: ' + stdout);});"

assignment Testing write permissions on tree folder...
